name: Homexin Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of a healthcare platform designed to find healthcare services in hospitals for those who need them. The company's platform uses machine learning techniques to find the best match for caregivers introduces alternative short-period care services to enlarge the total capacity of caregivers and utilizes artificial intelligence technology to instill efficiency and quality in the caregiver system, enabling patients to connect with medical professionals.
one_liner: Developer of a healthcare platform designed to find healthcare services in hospitals for those who need them. The company's platform uses machine learning techniques to find the best match for caregivers introduces alternative short-period care services to enlarge the total capacity of caregivers and utilizes artificial intelligence technology to instill efficiency and quality in the caregiver system, enabling patients to connect with medical professionals.
